alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lincoln; McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 8:26PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern McDuffie, northwestern Columbia and southeastern Lincoln Counties through 900 PM EST... At 825 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wrightsboro, or 10 miles northwest of Thomson, moving east at 40 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverwood, Mistletoe State Park, Appling, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Wrightsboro, Leah, Winfield, Clay Hill Campground, University Hospital McDuffie, Phinizy, Woodlawn, Double Branches, Columbia County Jail, Wildwood Park, Ansley Mill, Pollards Corner, Eubank-Blanchard Community Center, Lake Springs Recreation Area, Amity Recreation Area, and Bussey Point Campground. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 166 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
